fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__
Mika's dmg isn't noteworthy but you will need to build some level of Crit Rate to run effectively

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__"The Catch", Prototype Starglitter, Skyward Spine__
Any recharge polearm is a good secondary choice if you can't support Favonius' Crit Rate needs or just don't have it

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge / HP% |<goblet>  HP% |<circlet>  Healing Bonus / HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Skyfeather Song
**2)** Elemental Skill: Starfrost Swirl
**3)** Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Artifacts should aim to hit 200% recharge first
